attributes.action: Follow the Welsh and the Scottish Government's in giving all NHS workers £500
attributes.additional_details: On 1st may 2020 the welsh government decide it was right to give all NHS workers, some of whom have been put in propelled into the face of covid-19, Often without the adequate P.P.E a £500 one-off of payment. On 30th November 2020 the Scottish government followed suit in rewarding the NHS and care works the £500 one-off payment, Stating the new pay deal is likely to take an extend time to get to a deal. These works deserve to feel appreciated now.
attributes.background:
We all know that this global pandemic has been hard on all sectors not least the brave fount line staff, who have been busy worked selflessly through out this pandemic. 
We are asking for there to be a slimmer payment in the English NHS as there has been in both Scotland and wales.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Give NHS staff a one off bonus for their help with Covid 19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321150

To pay every NHS and Social Care Worker in England a £500 "Thank You" Bonus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495

Government to match the £500 bonus to all care staff: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320495
